message: Let's be fair and avoid inflation eating up our potential gains. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fairer, considering the inflation rates. Let's agree to this and avoid further losses.
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm feeling the inflation pinch more than you.  I'm willing to compromise slightly from my initial offer, but 55/45 is my bottom line to get this done now.
